coreAttributes.authorTag: On the inside of the magazine well, a small engraving reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: pepperball rifle
coreAttributes.description: This weapon uses an air spell to propel fin-stabilized capsules much farther than a conventional paintball marker. The capsules shatter on impact with auras, showering the immediate area with a pepper-based oil that produces an extremely painful burning sensation akin to being on fire.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] out the rifle, [npc.verb(load)] a drum magazine, [npc.verb(opens)] the gas regulator, and [npc.verb(turns)] on the attached red-dot sight.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] off the attached red-dot sight, [npc.verb(close)] the gas regulator, [npc.verb(unload)] the drum magazine, and [npc.verb(put)] the rifle away.
